title.actfund: Act Fund, the first platform enabling you to fund unique projects by simply giving your time!

404: The page you’re looking for can’t be found.

about.title: The first platform enabling you to fund unique projects by simply giving your time!

text.1: No need to empty your wallet,

select.title: Select
select.text: Members post their projects in need of fundraising. Simply select the one you love.

modal.title: Select projects you love
modal.text: Act Fund is presenting various projects that you can fundraise. Unlike crowd-funding, this is act-funding, no need to break the bank! Select a project and act for a sponsor!

act.title: Act
act.text: Watch a video, answer a survey or download an app from one of our sponsors. It’s that quick and easy.

text.1: You now just have to dedicate one minute of your time for a sponsor.
text.2: You can download an app from your smartphone, answer surveys, or even watch short videos.
text.3: Every action you are doing for the sponsor will enable to finance the project you care about.

done.title: Done
done.text: The project you selected will receive 80% of what the sponsor paid.

text.2: The answer is easy: hosting costs money, developers and other fees such as marketing goodies for our community, finding new partnership with sponsors...

preview.title: Here is a sneacky preview of what it will look like!
